mapper.select: (SELECT m.mess_id AS messageId, m.mess_recv_type AS messageType, s.stu_name AS messageRecvName, COUNT(mc.stu_id) AS messageRecvSum, SUBSTRING_INDEX(DATE_FORMAT(m.mess_send_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), '.', 1) AS messageTime, m.mess_title AS messageTitle, m.mess_content AS messageContent FROM message m LEFT JOIN student s ON s.stu_id = m.mess_revc_id LEFT JOIN mess_confirm mc on m.mess_id = mc.mess_id WHERE m.mess_recv_type = 0 AND m.mess_send_id = #{tId} GROUP BY mc.mess_id) UNION (SELECT m.mess_id AS messageId, m.mess_recv_type AS messageType, c.class_name AS messageRecvName, COUNT(mc.stu_id) AS messageRecvSum, SUBSTRING_INDEX(DATE_FORMAT(m.mess_send_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), '.', 1) AS messageTime, m.mess_title AS messageTitle, m.mess_content AS messageContent FROM message m LEFT JOIN class c on c.class_id = m.mess_revc_id LEFT JOIN mess_confirm mc on m.mess_id = mc.mess_id WHERE m.mess_recv_type = 1 AND m.mess_send_id = #{tId} GROUP BY mc.mess_id)
